summary: Scorpions are a popular German rock band formed in 1965. The band's most famous lineup included Rudolf Schenker (guitar), Klaus Meine (vocals), Matthias Jabs (guitar), Francis Buchholz (bass), and Herman Rarebell (drums). They gained success in the 1980s with albums like "Blackout" and "Love at First Sting." The band has sold over 100 million records worldwide. Their songs "Wind of Change," "Rock You Like a Hurricane," and "Still Loving You" are among their biggest hits and have become rock classics. Scorpions continue to perform and release music, with their latest album, "Rock Believer," coming out in 2022.
title: Scorpions (band)
